entry.title: Russia Is Offering Extra Payments to Mobilized Troops
entry.content: Subsidies, intended to bolster families of men called up in the unpopular draft for the war in Ukraine, are rolling out unevenly and sparking criticism.

entry.title: Ukrainians Urged to Ration Electricity Use as Russian Missiles Target Energy Infrastructure
entry.content: Moscow is seeking to erode the resilience of Ukrainian civilians even as the Kremlin attempts to regain the initiative against Kyiv on the battlefield.

entry.title: China's Military Is Catching Up to the U.S. Is It Ready for Battle?
entry.content: The Peopleâ€™s Liberation Army is emerging as a true competitor to the U.S. amid heightened tensions with Taiwan. The challenge for Xi Jinping is preparing troops to fight.
